Title: Provides for a charge-back of refunds of taxes levied by a school district to municipal public libraries and special district public libraries
Summary: Provides for a charge-back of refunds of taxes levied by a school district to municipal public libraries and special district public libraries.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing for a charge-back of refunds of taxes levied by a school district to municipal public libraries and special district public libraries
